caption:
Table 1: Summary statistics of datasets. We include (i) the reduction in the number of parameters, 
(ii) the change in accuracy of our best C&S model compared to the state-of-the-art GNN method, 
and (iii) the training time. By avoiding expensive GNNs, our methods require fewer parameters and 
are faster to train. Our methods are typically more accurate (see also Tables 2 and 4).
